body: Chris,  im having very small changes in the zone temperature using all the glazeArea operable and the operable height (value set to 1) ill send you an attached GH file with the configuration im using. im some cases im just getting a difference of .30 degrees in the zone [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Rbig4IUy3z8zh5C2zNH9Pe23lu5lo7g8WdL*hUp3060I7fjlJbSl1co3oKiavqknviqtOHAqZxYcc84t7L3IvHfBNh-9--Dl/Untitled1.jpg) thanks for your time !!
